name: Classic Wool Trench Coat
description: A timeless double-breasted trench coat made from a premium wool blend. Perfect for professional women during Cape Town winters.

name: Silk Blend Blouse
description: An elegant long-sleeve silk blouse, ideal for the office or a smart-casual event.

name: Tailored High-Waist Trousers
description: Perfectly tailored trousers with a flattering high-waist cut. A staple for any professional wardrobe.

name: Graphic Print Hoodie
description: A bold, oversized hoodie with custom graphics inspired by Johannesburg's street art scene.

name: Distressed Denim Jeans
description: Slim-fit distressed denim, offering a modern, edgy look for the youth market.

name: High-Top Canvas Sneakers
description: Durable and stylish high-top sneakers, a must-have for any streetwear enthusiast.

name: Hand-Blown Glass Vase
description: A unique, artisanal hand-blown glass vase, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any room.

name: Egyptian Cotton Duvet Set
description: Experience luxury with this 800 thread count Egyptian cotton duvet set.

name: Acacia Wood Serving Board
description: A beautiful and durable serving board made from sustainable acacia wood.

name: Trail-Running Shoes
description: High-performance trail-running shoes with superior grip and cushioning for tough terrain.

name: Moisture-Wicking T-Shirt
description: A lightweight, breathable t-shirt that wicks sweat away to keep you dry during workouts.

name: 3-Person Camping Tent
description: A durable, waterproof tent that's easy to set up, ideal for weekend outdoor adventures.

name: Leather Tote Bag
description: A spacious and stylish tote bag crafted from genuine South African leather.

name: Retro Bucket Hat
description: A 90s inspired retro bucket hat, perfect for completing any streetwear look.

name: Scented Soy Wax Candle
description: A hand-poured soy wax candle with a calming fynbos scent.

name: Yoga Mat
description: An extra-thick, non-slip yoga mat for comfort and stability.

name: Cashmere Scarf
description: An ultra-soft and warm cashmere scarf, the perfect accessory for a winter coat.

name: Cargo Pants
description: Utility cargo pants with multiple pockets, blending function and style.

name: Stoneware Dinner Set
description: A 16-piece dinner set made from durable, rustic stoneware.

name: Insulated Water Bottle
description: A 750ml double-walled stainless steel bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours.

name: Pinstripe Blazer
description: A sharp, single-button pinstripe blazer for the modern professional.

name: Oversized Graphic T-Shirt
description: An oversized cotton t-shirt featuring a limited edition design from a local artist.

name: Linen Throw Blanket
description: A lightweight and breathable linen throw blanket for your couch or bed.

name: Cycling Shorts
description: Padded cycling shorts designed for long-distance comfort and performance.

name: Duffel Bag
description: A spacious 40L duffel bag, perfect for the gym or weekend trips.
